name: Magic relics
description: Enchanted artifacts imbued with mystical properties, ranging from enhancing abilities to granting extraordinary powers.

name: Equipment
description: Tools and weapons crafted for combat and utility, often enhanced with magical properties or made from rare materials.

name: Potions
description: Magical elixirs and brews that bestow temporary enhancements or abilities upon the drinker, crafted through arcane alchemy.
